title: my suggestion for clash in a badly written poem
body:
if the servers get finer
and the crashing is minor
it would be very nice
with my great advice
that clash could be
at afternoon tea
as this would be great
for me and my mates*

thank you for listening to my ted talk, it would be quite nice if clash could be in afternoons nz time on weekends as it wouldnt be that bad for australian players nor that bad for nz players, as clash ends past midnight for us.

*non existent
